title: pixel 5 scratches easily. SIM card tray bent
content:
I ejected the SIM tray when I got the device with the included SIM ejection tool. The tray is now slightly warped. I bought a case so I can't feel the imperfection now. I worry it ruins the water proof.

Google support said device damage is now warranty void. I don't feel it was my fault. 

The screen also scratches easily I have never had a problem with any of these devices.

I have had all the Nexus and pixels and never had these problems.
